column23: And I've been keeping all the letters
column28: Each one a line or two
column29: 每一封仅有那么一两行字
column33: I would send them but I know that
column34: 我会把这些信都寄给你，但是我知道
column36: 我做的这些还远远不够
column37: My words were cold and flat
column39: And you deserve more than that
column44: 又一架飞机，又一个晴朗的地方
column55: I'm just too far from where you are
column56: 我只是离你所在之地太过遥远
column60: And I feel just like I'm living
column64: It's like I just stepped outside
column65: 我就像过上了另一种生活
column70: You could not come along with me
column74: But you always believed in me...
column105: 亲爱的，我已经在路上了
